}
{title &&
{title}
} {caption &&
{caption}
}
{subtitle &&
{subtitle.map((sub, index) => ( sub && `${index !== 0 ? ' / ' : ''}${sub}` ))}
}
{children}
{rating &&
} {popularity &&
🍿 #{popularity}
}
) } export default Card
